title: MVP: Liquid Mail (Honcho-only CLI)
description:
## Goal
Ship a minimal CLI-only agent mail system built on Honcho primitives (messages + metadata + search + summaries + chat).

## Plan Reference
- docs/liquid-mail-complete-plan.md

## Scope (MVP)
- Commands: post, summarize, query, decisions, notify (+ schema/topics utilities)
- Topics as Honcho sessions
- Decisions-as-messages indexing
- Conflict blocking via search → shortlist → chat classify
- JSON-first output w/ robust TTY auto-switch

## Non-Goals (for MVP)
- Local storage (no SQLite/Git state beyond config)
- Complex daemons or watchers (notify is pull-based)

title: Implement auto-topic resolution + get-or-create
description:
## Summary
Implement the dominance-based auto-topic flow and session creation.

## Flow
1) Search workspace for message text (limit K)
2) Compute dominance by session_id
3) If dominance >= threshold & min_hits met: choose topic
4) Else: create new session (if auto_create) or require --topic
5) If topics.max_active is set: enforce cap before creating a new topic
6) If low-confidence: return candidate topic suggestions in output

## Acceptance
- Uses existing chooseTopicFromMatches
- Honors config: detection_enabled, auto_create, threshold, K, min_hits, max_active
- Returns deterministic decision object for logging/JSON output
- Provides top-K candidate topics when confidence is low

title: Add topic cap + consolidation policy
description:
## Summary
Introduce a configurable cap on active topics (sessions) and define a consolidation policy to stay under the cap.

## Default Strategy (MVP)
- **Merge into a new topic ID** when cap exceeded.
- Old topics remain intact and are linked/redirected from the new merged topic.

## Proposed Config
- topics.max_active (integer or null for unlimited)
- topics.consolidation_strategy: "merge" | "archive" | "summarize" (default: merge)

## Merge Policy (MVP)
- Use model‑driven selection based on **short summaries only**.
- Select **single best pair** to merge (two at a time).
- Merge candidates are chosen from **existing topics** (not necessarily the newly created one).
- Prompt the model to select which topics should merge; require strict JSON output.
- Create new topic/session with metadata:
  - lm.kind = "topic_merge"
  - lm.merged_from = [old_topic_ids]
- Emit system message in each old topic pointing to new topic.

## Acceptance
- Cap enforced when creating new topic
- Deterministic selection (bounded retries + strict JSON)
- Clear user‑visible reason in JSON output when cap triggers merge

title: Return topic suggestions to agents (low-confidence)
description:
## Summary
When auto-topic confidence is low, return a short list of candidate topics so agents can choose without hunting.

## Behavior
- On low-confidence auto-topic, include top-K candidate topics with dominance scores in JSON output
- If `--text`, print a brief suggestion list

## Acceptance
- Deterministic suggestions from workspace search
- Helps agents pick existing topics without manual `topics` scan

title: M3: Decisions + Conflict Blocking
description:
## Goal
Capture decisions as first-class artifacts and block contradictory decisions deterministically.

## Plan References

- docs/liquid-mail-complete-plan.md#decision-8-conflict-detection-blocking

## Deliverables

- Decisions-as-messages indexing (system peer + metadata + idempotency)
- Conflict preflight: search → shortlist → chat classify → block unless --yes

title: Implement decision detection heuristic
description:
## Summary
Implement a deterministic, low-false-positive way to decide when a post should trigger decision hooks.

## MVP Rules
- If `--decision` flag is set → decision-bearing
- Else if message contains a line starting with `DECISION:` → decision-bearing
- Else if config `conflicts.decisions_only=false` → allow heuristic extraction (deferred)

## Acceptance
- Utility function returns boolean + extracted decision candidates (if any)

title: Implement decision extraction via chat (strict JSON)
description:
## Summary
Use Honcho chat/dialectic to extract decision statements and return strict JSON.

## Deliverables
- src/decisions/extract.ts
- Prompt template + strict JSON schema validation (reject non-conforming output)

## Acceptance
- Given input text, returns { decisions: string[] }
- Handles empty/no decisions deterministically
- Includes retry logic for malformed model output (bounded)

title: Index decisions as messages (system peer + metadata + idempotency)
description:
## Summary
Post extracted decisions back into the same topic as normal messages authored by the system peer.

## Deliverables
- src/decisions/index.ts
- Stable metadata:
  - lm.schema_version
  - lm.kind = decision
  - lm.source_message_id
  - lm.decision_id (stable hash)

## Acceptance
- Retrying indexing does not duplicate (idempotent via source_message_id)

title: Implement conflict preflight (search → shortlist → chat classify)
description:
## Summary
Before posting a decision, detect conflicts against prior decision messages in the same topic and block unless `--yes`.

## Flow
1) Search prior decision messages in topic (metadata filter)
2) Shortlist top N (configurable limit)
3) Send proposed + shortlist to chat/dialectic
4) Parse strict JSON response
5) If any conflict >= threshold → block (unless --yes)

## Deliverables
- src/conflicts/check.ts

## Acceptance
- Deterministic block decision based on confidence threshold
- Respects shortlist limit to control cost
- Emits robot-mode error JSON with rationale + suggested_action

title: Integrate decisions + conflicts into post flow
description:
## Summary
Upgrade `post` to the full MVP flow: auto-topic (optional), conflict preflight, post, idempotent decision extraction/indexing.

## Post Order (atomic where it matters)
1) Resolve topic (explicit or auto-topic)
2) If decision-bearing: conflict preflight (block)
3) Post main message
4) Best-effort: extract + index decisions

## Acceptance
- Conflicts block before main post
- Indexing is safe to retry (no duplicates)
